products.name: Red Inflatable Castle with Slide
products.description: An impressive castle-themed bounce house featuring a thrilling slide attachment. Perfect for royal celebrations and active play, this bouncer combines the magic of a castle with the excitement of sliding fun.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 10 children at once. No shoes, sharp objects, or food inside.

products.description: An awesome castle-themed bounce house featuring a thrilling slide attachment. Perfect for royal celebrations and active play, this bouncer combines the magic of a castle with the excitement of sliding fun.

images.alt: Blue Castle with Slide Front View

products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 10 children at once. No shoes, sharp objects, or food inside.

products.name: Crayola Castle
products.description: A spacious castle-themed bounce house perfect for multiple children to enjoy simultaneously. Features medieval-inspired design elements and plenty of bouncing space.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 8 children at once. No shoes, sharp objects, or food inside.

products.name: Medium Castle
products.description: A perfectly sized castle bounce house ideal for smaller gatherings and limited spaces. Features classic castle design elements and safe bouncing area.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 6 children at once. No shoes, sharp objects, or food inside.

products.name: Junior Bounce
products.description: Versatile bounce house suitable for both dry and wet use. Perfect for young children with its manageable size and safety features.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 6 children at once. No shoes, sharp objects, or food inside. Extra caution when wet.

products.name: Green Junior Playground
products.description: Ultimate junior water park experience featuring dual slides, water sprays, ball pit pool, and an exciting tunnel. This green and orange themed inflatable combines multiple play elements including bodyboarding, splash zones, and a slip slide for maximum entertainment.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 10 children at once. Maximum total weight 400 lbs. No running on wet surfaces. No rough play. Proper swimwear required.

products.name: Blue Junior Water Park
products.description: Exciting water park perfect for younger children featuring splash zones and water activities. Compact design delivers maximum fun in a manageable space.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 6 children at once. No running on wet surfaces. No rough play. Proper swimwear required.

products.name: Tropical Combo
products.description: Tropical-themed combination unit featuring both dry bouncing area and water play options. Perfect for summer parties and versatile entertainment.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 8 children at once. No shoes, sharp objects, or food inside. Extra caution when wet.

products.name: Lime Water Slide
products.description: Exciting lime-themed water slide perfect for hot summer days. Features a long sliding surface and splash landing area.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. One slider at a time. No running on wet surfaces. No horseplay on stairs.

products.name: TALL Red Water Slide
products.description: Our tallest water slide featuring an impressive height and extended slide length. Delivers maximum excitement with a thrilling descent and splash landing.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. One slider at a time. No running on wet surfaces. No horseplay on stairs.

products.description: Ultimate water play combo unit featuring a bounce house, water slide, and splash pool. Perfect for summer parties and active entertainment.

images.alt: Wet Bounce House with Slide Front View

products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. One slider at a time. No running on wet surfaces. No horseplay on stairs.

products.description: Classic white bounce house suitable for any event theme. Clean design and reliable construction make it perfect for various celebrations.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 6 children at once. No shoes, sharp objects, or food inside.

products.name: Arch Bounce
products.description: Distinctive arched design bounce house offering unique aesthetic appeal and plenty of jumping space. Perfect for special events and parties.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 8 children at once. No shoes, sharp objects, or food inside.

products.name: Balloon Bounce
products.description: Festive balloon-themed bounce house perfect for birthday parties and celebrations. Colorful design and reliable construction ensure hours of fun.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 8 children at once. No shoes, sharp objects, or food inside.

products.name: Large Balloon Castle with Slide
products.description: Enhanced balloon-themed bounce house featuring an exciting slide. Combines bouncing fun with sliding excitement in a festive package.

products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 10 children at once. No shoes, sharp objects, or food inside. One at a time on slide.

products.name: Basketball Shoot
products.description: Inflatable basketball game perfect for sports-themed events and active entertainment. Features basketball hoop and enclosed play area.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 2 players at once. No hanging on rim or aggressive play.

products.name: Mini Bounce
products.description: Compact bounce house perfect for smaller spaces and younger children. Versatile design allows for both dry and wet use.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 3 children at once. No shoes, sharp objects, or food inside.

products.name: Blue Water Slide
products.description: Refreshing blue water slide perfect for summer fun. Features smooth sliding surface and safe landing area.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. One slider at a time. No running on wet surfaces. No horseplay on stairs.

products.name: 4500W Generator
products.description: Reliable 4500-watt generator perfect for powering bounce houses and party equipment. Features quiet operation and fuel efficiency.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult operation only. Keep away from water and flammable materials. Maintain proper ventilation. Follow provided operating instructions.
weatherRestrictions: Keep protected from rain and moisture

products.name: Tables and Chairs
products.description: Complete seating solution including one table and six chairs. Perfect for party setup and guest accommodation.
products.safetyGuidelines: Ensure stable placement on flat surface. Do not stand on chairs or table. Maximum weight capacity 300 lbs per table, 250 lbs per chair.
weatherRestrictions: Secure or store indoors during high winds

products.name: Children's Table and Chair Set
products.description: Height-adjustable table and six chairs suitable for boys and girls aged 2-12. The tabletop is paintable and easy to clean, making it perfect for family learning and daily use.

images.alt: Children's Table and Chair Set - Wood Color

products.safetyGuidelines: Ensure stable placement on a flat surface. Do not stand on chairs or table. Maximum weight capacity: 330 lbs for table, 220 lbs per chair.

products.name: Cotton Candy Machine
products.description: Professional cotton candy machine perfect for creating fluffy, sweet treats. Includes blue raspberry and pink vanilla sugar flavors with paper serving cones.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult operation only. Keep away from water. Hot surfaces during operation. Follow provided operating instructions.

products.name: Popcorn Machine
products.description: Professional popcorn machine capable of serving over 100 guests. Perfect for adding a classic concession stand touch to any event.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult operation only. Keep away from water. Hot surfaces during operation. Follow provided operating instructions.

products.name: 15L Slush Machine with Virgin Mix
products.description: Professional-grade 15L/3 gallon slushy machine with advanced features. Stainless steel construction with food-grade PC tank and two-layer ABS lid ensure durability and easy maintenance. Features precise temperature control (26.6°F to 28.4°F), powerful 500W compressor for rapid cooling, and illuminated tank to showcase vibrant beverages. Perfect for events, parties, and commercial use.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult operation only. Keep away from water. Follow provided operating instructions. Clean thoroughly after use.

products.name: Large White Combo with Slide
products.description: Elegant white-themed combo unit featuring a spacious bounce area and thrilling slide. Perfect for weddings, formal events, and celebrations requiring a sophisticated touch while providing maximum entertainment.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 10 children at once. No shoes, sharp objects, or food inside. One at a time on slide.

products.name: 15L Slush Machine with Alcoholic Mix
products.description: Professional-grade 15L/3 gallon frozen margarita machine with advanced features. Stainless steel construction with food-grade PC tank and two-layer ABS lid ensure durability and easy maintenance. Features precise temperature control (26.6°F to 28.4°F), powerful 500W compressor for rapid cooling, and illuminated tank to showcase your frozen cocktails. Includes your choice of one gallon of margarita mix, pina colada mix, or strawberry daiquiri mix. Perfect for adult parties and events.

specifications.name: Included Mix Options
specifications.value: Choice of Margarita, Pina Colada, or Strawberry Daiquiri (1 gallon)

products.safetyGuidelines: Adult operation only (21+). Keep away from water. Follow provided operating instructions. Valid ID required for rental. Clean thoroughly after use.

products.name: 30L Double Tank Slush Machine with Virgin Mix
products.description: Superior commercial-grade slush machine featuring dual 15L tanks (30L total capacity) with virgin drink mix included. Features a premium 700W compressor with copper condenser for rapid cooling and energy efficiency. Food-grade PC containers and 3-layer stainless steel construction ensure durability and safety. Independent cooling and mixing controls, plus large discharge faucets for easy serving. Perfect for convenience stores, hotels, dessert shops, cafés, and events.

images.alt: Double Tank Slush Machine Front View
Double Tank Slush Machine Side VIew

products.safetyGuidelines: Adult operation only. Keep away from water. Follow provided operating instructions. Clean thoroughly after use.

products.name: 30L Double Tank Slush Machine with Alcoholic Mix
products.description: Superior commercial-grade slush machine featuring dual 15L tanks (30L total capacity) with alcoholic beverage mix included. Features a premium 700W compressor with copper condenser for rapid cooling and energy efficiency. Food-grade PC containers and 3-layer stainless steel construction ensure durability and safety. Independent cooling and mixing controls, plus large discharge faucets for easy serving. Perfect for bars, events, and adult parties.

images.alt: Double Tank Slush Machine Front View
Double Tank Slush Machine Side VIew

products.safetyGuidelines: Adult operation only (21+). Keep away from water. Follow provided operating instructions. Valid ID required for rental. Clean thoroughly after use.

products.name: Snow Cone Machine
products.description: Refreshing snow cone machine perfect for summer events. Produces approximately 50 servings of fluffy shaved ice for sweet treats.
products.safetyGuidelines: Adult operation only. Keep hands away from ice shaver. Follow provided operating instructions.

products.safetyGuidelines: Adult supervision required. Maximum 8 children at once. No shoes, sharp objects, or food inside.
